mapper.sql: FID, FCREATORID, FCREATETIME, FLASTUPDATEUSERID, FLASTUPDATETIME, FCONTROLUNITID, FNUMBER, FBIZDATE, FHANDLERID, FDESCRIPTION, FHASEFFECTED, FAUDITORID, FSOURCEBILLID, FSOURCEFUNCTION, FFIVOUCHERED, CFORGUNITID, CFWEEKHAO, CFTOORGUNITID, CFGENETICSID, CFIFAUDITING, CFAUDITUSERID, CFBOARID, CFBATCHNUMBER, CFAPPLICATIONID, CFBIRTHDATE, CFSEMENNUMBERID, CFNOTE, CFEARNUMBERID, CFENDDATE, CFZHUSHEID, CFDOSEID, CFCOMPLETESTATUSID, CFSHELFDATE, CFSHCHANLINEID, CFSOURCEORGUNITID
mapper.select: select * from CT_PIG_SPERMALLOTRECORD s where s.CFAPPLICATIONID = #{applicationId} and s.FBIZDATE <= #{endDate} and s.FBIZDATE >= #{startDate}

SELECT * FROM CT_PIG_SPERMALLOTRECORD s LEFT JOIN (select to_char (sysdate- level + 1, 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss') today FROM DUAL connect BY LEVEL <= 7) days on days.today = s.FCREATETIME WHERE s.CFAPPLICATIONID = #{applicationId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} ORDER BY s.FCREATETIME
mapper.insert: insert into CT_PIG_SPERMALLOTRECORD (FCREATORID, FCREATETIME, FLASTUPDATEUSERID, FLASTUPDATETIME, FCONTROLUNITID, FNUMBER, FBIZDATE, FHANDLERID, FDESCRIPTION, FHASEFFECTED, FAUDITORID, FSOURCEBILLID, FSOURCEFUNCTION, FFIVOUCHERED, CFORGUNITID, CFWEEKHAO, CFTOORGUNITID, CFGENETICSID, CFIFAUDITING, CFAUDITUSERID, CFBOARID, CFBATCHNUMBER, CFAPPLICATIONID, CFBIRTHDATE, CFSEMENNUMBERID, CFNOTE, CFEARNUMBERID, CFENDDATE, CFZHUSHEID, CFDOSEID, CFCOMPLETESTATUSID, CFSHELFDATE, CFSHCHANLINEID, CFSOURCEORGUNITID) values (#{fcreatorid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{fcreatetime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{flastupdateuserid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{flastupdatetime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{fcontrolunitid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{fnumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{fbizdate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{fhandlerid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{fdescription,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{fhaseffected,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{fauditorid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{fsourcebillid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{fsourcefunction,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{ffivouchered,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{cforgunitid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{cfweekhao,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{cftoorgunitid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{cfgeneticsid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{cfifauditing,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{cfaudituserid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{cfboarid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{cfbatchnumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{cfapplicationid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{cfbirthdate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{cfsemennumberid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{cfnote,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{cfearnumberid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{cfenddate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{cfzhusheid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{cfdoseid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{cfcompletestatusid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{cfshelfdate,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{cfshchanlineid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{cfsourceorgunitid,jdbcType=VARCHAR})

update CT_PIG_SPERMALLOTRECORD
FCREATORID = #{fcreatorid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
FCREATETIME = #{fcreatetime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
FLASTUPDATEUSERID = #{flastupdateuserid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
FLASTUPDATETIME = #{flastupdatetime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
FCONTROLUNITID = #{fcontrolunitid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
FNUMBER = #{fnumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
FBIZDATE = #{fbizdate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
FHANDLERID = #{fhandlerid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
FDESCRIPTION = #{fdescription,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
FHASEFFECTED = #{fhaseffected,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
FAUDITORID = #{fauditorid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
FSOURCEBILLID = #{fsourcebillid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
FSOURCEFUNCTION = #{fsourcefunction,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
FFIVOUCHERED = #{ffivouchered,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
CFORGUNITID = #{cforgunitid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CFWEEKHAO = #{cfweekhao,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CFTOORGUNITID = #{cftoorgunitid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CFGENETICSID = #{cfgeneticsid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CFIFAUDITING = #{cfifauditing,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
CFAUDITUSERID = #{cfaudituserid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CFBOARID = #{cfboarid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CFBATCHNUMBER = #{cfbatchnumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CFAPPLICATIONID = #{cfapplicationid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CFBIRTHDATE = #{cfbirthdate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
CFSEMENNUMBERID = #{cfsemennumberid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CFNOTE = #{cfnote,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CFEARNUMBERID = #{cfearnumberid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CFENDDATE = #{cfenddate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
CFZHUSHEID = #{cfzhusheid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CFDOSEID = #{cfdoseid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CFCOMPLETESTATUSID = #{cfcompletestatusid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CFSHELFDATE = #{cfshelfdate,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
CFSHCHANLINEID = #{cfshchanlineid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CFSOURCEORGUNITID = #{cfsourceorgunitid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where FID = #{fid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update CT_PIG_SPERMALLOTRECORD set FCREATORID = #{fcreatorid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, FCREATETIME = #{fcreatetime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, FLASTUPDATEUSERID = #{flastupdateuserid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, FLASTUPDATETIME = #{flastupdatetime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, FCONTROLUNITID = #{fcontrolunitid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, FNUMBER = #{fnumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, FBIZDATE = #{fbizdate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, FHANDLERID = #{fhandlerid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, FDESCRIPTION = #{fdescription,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, FHASEFFECTED = #{fhaseffected,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, FAUDITORID = #{fauditorid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, FSOURCEBILLID = #{fsourcebillid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, FSOURCEFUNCTION = #{fsourcefunction,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, FFIVOUCHERED = #{ffivouchered,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, CFORGUNITID = #{cforgunitid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CFWEEKHAO = #{cfweekhao,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CFTOORGUNITID = #{cftoorgunitid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CFGENETICSID = #{cfgeneticsid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CFIFAUDITING = #{cfifauditing,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, CFAUDITUSERID = #{cfaudituserid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CFBOARID = #{cfboarid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CFBATCHNUMBER = #{cfbatchnumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CFAPPLICATIONID = #{cfapplicationid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CFBIRTHDATE = #{cfbirthdate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, CFSEMENNUMBERID = #{cfsemennumberid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CFNOTE = #{cfnote,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CFEARNUMBERID = #{cfearnumberid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CFENDDATE = #{cfenddate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, CFZHUSHEID = #{cfzhusheid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CFDOSEID = #{cfdoseid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CFCOMPLETESTATUSID = #{cfcompletestatusid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CFSHELFDATE = #{cfshelfdate,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, CFSHCHANLINEID = #{cfshchanlineid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CFSOURCEORGUNITID = #{cfsourceorgunitid,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where FID = #{fid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
update CT_PIG_SPERMALLOTRECORD c set c.CFIFAUDITING = '1', c.CFAUDITUSERID = #{userId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where c.FID = #{fid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
